FuncDef: The display pki cmp statistics command displays CMP session statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a CMP session.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display pki cmp statistics session session1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check whether the information exchanged between a device and CA server is correct, run the display pki cmp statistics command to view CMP session statistics.
